Title: Land of the Apex
Description:
You should know of Rellen, the Learned, who gave centaur the tools to survive a merciless land. His memory requires offerings from worthy beasts.

Take care, traveler. They are not as dangerous as they were eons past, but they're still the plains' apex predators.
ObjectivesText: Collect 10 Shadespinner Webs, 2 Slyvern Talons, and 2 Thunderspine Scales.
RewardText: You've returned intact. Good. Always respect the animals' prowess.
